comments:
Not sure if this is the correct component to log this PR under.

If I create a Java Scrapbook Page in a non-Java project, then try to execute
some Java code in the scrapbook page, an exception occurs.  

STEPS:
File-> New-> Other-> Java-> Java Scrapbook Page
Enter a folder name e.g. /ZZ
	Note: The project ZZ does not yet exist, I think the default action is to create
				a non-Java project
Enter file name MyScrap
Finish
In MyScrap type:
	System.out.println("Karice")
Select the line
Ctrl + E

#1
The first time you do this the following 4 lines are printed to the (DOS)
console (are these debug messages that will be removed?):
Operation waiting to be executed... :-/
Operation started... :-)
Operation waiting to be executed... :-/
Operation started... :-)

#2
Then the following exception occurs: (subsequent executions just give the exception)
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Project must be built to perform evaluati
ons
        at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException.<init>(DebugException.java:75)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.JDIThread.evaluate(JDIThread.java
:344)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.JDIThread.evaluate(JDIThread.java
:357)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor.evaluate(
JavaSnippetEditor.java:247)
        at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.snippeteditor.JavaSnippetEditor$1.run(Jav
aSnippetEditor.java:240)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.RunnableLock.run(RunnableLock.java:26)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Synchronizer.runAsyncMessages(Synchronizer.ja
va:85)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runAsyncMessages(Display.java:1019)
        at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java(Compiled
 Code))
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:566)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.run(Workbench.java:554)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoa
der.java:800)
        at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:174)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:60)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:222)
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.UIMain.main(UIMain.java:43)


When I execute the Java code snip from a page that is contained by a Java 
project the exception does not occur.

Should I be allowed to create a Scrapbook page in a non-Java project?

NOTES:
EG (5/4/2001 2:22:52 AM)
	#1 - have seen this need to investigate
	#2 - the project has to have build state, need to be smarter
	#3 - since a non-Java project can never have build state you should not be
			allowed to create a scrapbook page in a non-Java project

EG (5/17/2001 11:48:14 AM)
	DW can pls look into #1

DW (5/18/01 2:27:58 PM)
	#1 is not an issue. The messages were core debug messages.
	#2 Dup of 1G4PK75: ITPJUI:WINNT - Snippet eval: build project when it isn't already built

DW (5/18/01 2:29:14 PM)
	Moved to JUI for #3.
